name: TapThat
description:
Tap That is a tapping game where you have to do exactly what it says on the tin, Tap That.

All you have to do is tap on the circle when it appears on the screen. What could be more simple...right?

It is said that "If the height of a step is off by as little as 2mm, most people will fall". Well what if a pattern isn't quite what it seems?

Think you can best this oh so simple game? Prove it by sharing your scores with your friends and challenging them to Tap That.
